author: ravie
title: Fun for the holidays
review:
This is a fun little set for the holidays.  The pieces for each Santa are packaged separately with separate instructions so it easy to divide the set up between multiple kids for assembly.  

The snowboarding and skiing Santa won't hold up well to much more than very gentle play.  The legs have a habit of breaking.  They are easy enough to put back on though and continue on with your reindeer games.
